July 31, 2014, Dayna worked with Alan but at different companies

Alan is an overall awesome guy! He completely understands the value of finding the right "fit" for a company versus just finding the right skills to match a job ad, and he's consistently shown that since I've met him. He's great at utilizing his resources to creatively find top talent to refer to the companies he works with, and he's demonstrated a true altruistic spirit in helping great people find great work. I highly recommend Alan to anyone on the hunt for a recruiter who just gets "it".

June 15, 2016, Lynelle worked with Alan in the same group

Lynelle is everything you can ask for in a business partner.  As a recruiter, it is key that the communication between and Account Exec and the recruiter be fluid, in real time and without judgement.  Lynelle is great at expressing a client's needs in a way that a recruiter can easily articulate it to potential candidates and she is even better at working with the recruiter on finding solutions through recruitment efforts and not simply rejecting an option because it isn't a bullseye.   I very much enjoyed working with Lynelle and would do so again in a minute if given the opportunity to do so.

summary: With nearly 6 years of specialized expertise in recruiting "hard to find" candidates for very discerning clients, and 13+ as an entrepreneur and networker, I enjoy the search for the perfect fit for the positions on my desk. I won't force a square peg into a round space. Using multiple resources and a vast network of relationships built on trust and honesty, I enjoy recruiting the candidate who meets the client's high standards. I can farm, I can hunt... but if I need to be in a category, I see myself as a prospector. Just give me a shovel and a pan and I will dig until I find the gold!Oh... and I cook pretty well too.Currently have opportunities with some great Arizona and California companies for...Java / J2EEAngular / Node / Kendo UI / Backbone / Bootstrap / MEAN / javascript.Net/C#/MVC DevelopersObject Oriented PHPHTML/CSS/Javascript DevelopersSQL DBAsProject ManagersBusiness Intelligence Managers and AnalystsIG @sonofehrlich
